name: particles.ts
author: Volk <templar.volk@yandex.com>
description: A highly configurble javascript library for creating interactive particles in the browser

scripts.build: npm run build-amd && npm run build-dist
scripts.build-dist: node build.js && tsc tmp/bundle.ts --outFile dist/particles.js --lib es6,DOM --module none && minify dist/particles.js --out-file dist/particles.min.js --mangle.keepClassName && rm -r tmp
